name: Hang on, Bill!
description:
Ahoy, Pardner! Bill M. was captured while robbing the federal bank and things look bleak for him! The good news is rogue Indians chased his captors away before they could finish him off. The bad news is he is stuck with an uncomfortably tight loop around his neck. Try and help him escape by figuring out the sequence of clicks that can save him from this perilous situation!

How to play:

  • Use the mouse to click on the objects around the screen and see what they do. Try to find the sequence that saves Bill but be careful - Time passes with every click!
  • Press F to enter/exit fullscreen mode for maximum pixels

Was made in 72 hours for the ludum dare 47 gamejam:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/hang-on-bill
